Class Action

java.lang.Object
  Action
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreateGiftAction, CreateItemAction, GenerateCustomerListAction, GenerateGiftListAction, GenerateItemListAction, GenerateStoreReportAction, RedeemGiftAction, SaleItemAction, SearchCustomerByNameAction, SearchGiftByNameAction, SearchGiftsByPointsValueAction, SearchItemByNameAction, SearchItemsByPriceAction
public abstract class Action
extends Object

The base class of all other action classes.

Author:
Xu Waycell, Way Studios
See Also:
Terminal, Menu

getIOUtility

Obtain a IOUtility from its master.

Returns:
A IOUtility to handle and help input and output operations.

Get action parent object

Returns:

isRunning

public boolean isRunning()
Check if the action is running or not

Returns:
True when it is in action or false if it is not.
See Also:
start(), stop()

routine

protected abstract void routine()
A abstract method interface will be called in each loop circle.
NOTE:It is very important to implement this method in each derived classes

Set a new owner to the action

Parameters:

public void start()
Start the action loop until the method stop has been called.

public void stop()

See Also:
